item.title: Keiser Report - Food vouchers for peasants (E1432)
item.description: ###Food vouchers for peasants (E1432) In this episode of the Keiser Report, Max and Stacy discuss Foodbank South Australia which is now creating a new project aimed at subsidizing clients with vouchers funded by the major bank to buy basic needs — in order to avoid any defaulting mortgage payments. In the second half, Max interviews Mark Valek, the author of the ‘In Gold We Trust’ report, about the roles of gold and bitcoin in times when a “social contract” does not work anymore.

item.title: About Hugo
item.description: Hugo is a static site engine written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: Cobra Viper J Walter Weatherman Cast Learn more and contribute on GitHub. Setup Some fun facts about Hugo: Built in Go Loosely inspired by Jekyll Primarily developed by spf13 on the train while commuting to and from Manhattan. Coded in Vim using spf13-vim Have questions or suggestions?
